about_the_game:
Welcome to Dimraeth, an enchanting world where adventure awaits at every turn. Gather your friends and embark on a thrilling journey through diverse lands teeming with magic, mystery, and wonder. Explore a realm inhabited by a mix of playable races and creatures, each with their own unique beliefs and vibrant cultures. The continent is in peril, threatened by encroaching evils, and the powerful wizard Faustas has summoned you and other brave souls to defend this fragile world. Choose your own playstyle, mastering unique spells and mechanics that will aid you and your companions as you traverse the breathtaking landscapes of Dimraeth. The fate of this magical realm rests in your hands—are you ready to rise to the challenge?

Adventure Awaits!
  • Embark on epic journeys solo or with up to 8 friends in a vibrant, ever-changing world.
  • Discover unique villages and towns across diverse foreign lands.
  • Experience dynamic weather and lighting systems that bring the world to life with time-of-day effects.
  • Battle against an array of unique monsters that challenge your skills and strategy.
  • Create powerful synergies with customizable race and class ability combinations.
  • Explore procedurally generated dungeons, ensuring every adventure is a fresh and exciting challenge.



Unleash Your Character!
  • Choose from a variety of races, each offering unique traits and abilities.
  • Master one of six distinct classes: builder, mage, brawler, bulwark, lurker, and shaman.
  • Enhance your gameplay with runes.

Craft Your Path!
  • Gather resources through harvesting, mining, woodcutting, herb collection, and looting.
  • Craft essential items, cook delicious food, and create potent potions and tools to aid your journey.
  • Enjoy a comprehensive fishing system, adding a relaxing and rewarding activity to your adventure.

Step into the magical world of Dimraeth and let your adventure begin!

short_description: A fantasy topdown multiplayer RPG. Features a combination of 8 races and 6 classes. Explore new lands, trade with villages, upgrade runes, unlock new spells, craft, and more! Team with your friends to raid dungeons for special hidden rewards. Defend Dimraeth and choose your own destiny.
